doc.title: DanceCrazy Presents: Learn to Dance Rumba Volume 2 - A Beginners Rumba Dancing Guide
doc.plot: DanceCrazy.com presents the second of our two beginning DVDs in you complete step by step guide to dancing the beautiful Rumba! In this DVD we finish your fundamental Rumba instruction, and add even more flair, passion, and style. Volume 2 picks up where Volume 1 left off, and then guides you through some of the more exciting and complex Rumba Dance basics! With this DVD, you'll be improving and progressing as we continue to break down each and every step with simplicity and ease. Rumba Volume 2 provides you with easy to follow instruction with multi-angled presentation, helpful tips, practice to the music, and important advice for sustained success on the dance floor.
